channel.title: Introduction on Padgett: Beyond-STAT
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Padgett: Beyond-STAT

item.title: Starting up Beyond-STAT
item.description: Hello people (or non-people, I aim to be inclusive)! My name is Noah, and this is the start of my website and blog! The I have finally entered the world of having my own website. This feels like so much work so far, and I am happy to finally starting to have my own place to write what I want. One of the major reasons I have started this website is to have a place to host my own writings.
